snippet: Angry residents of the island of Papua burned cars and shops on Thursday after an independence activist was shot and killed, the police and human rights activists said.
abstract: Angry residents of the island of Papua, Indonesia, burn cars and shops after Mako Tabuni, an independence activist, is shot and killed after resisting arrest.
lead_paragraph: Angry residents of the island of Papua burned cars and shops on Thursday after an independence activist was shot and killed, the police and human rights activists said.

headline.seo: Indonesia: Riots Erupt After Police Kill Activist
headline.main: Indonesia: Riots Erupt After Police Fatally Shoot Activist at His Arrest
headline.print_headline: Indonesia: Riots Erupt After Police Fatally Shoot Activist at His Arrest
